DOC.detailed_description: The goal study investigate role sympathetic-adrenal medullary ( SAM ) hy0pothalamo-pituitary-adrenal ( HPA ) system mediate addictive effect cocaine . A toal 6 male subject enrol 5 day inpatient study . Subjects assign either cocaine ( 32mg /70kg iv ) placebo ( saline iv ) treatment first experimental session cross alternative treatment second experimental session . Endpoints follow experimental session include neuroendocrine ( serum epinephrine , norepinephrine cortisol level ) , physological ( heart rate/blood pressure , EKG ) subjective measure ( Beck Depression Inventory , Craving Questionnaire ) . We hypothesize cocaine administration would lead increase blood level norpinephrine , epinephrine cortisol cocaine dependent subject .
